BATTLESHIP

How to play?

Phase 1

•First you need to deploy your ships on the grid Captain!

•Once you have deployed all your ships you can start the battle and then you will move to the second phase.

NOTE: You can't depliy ships on the adjacent positions of another ship.

Phase 2

•In this phase you need to shoot the grids to destroy the enemy ships.

•Once you land a shot on the enemy ship you get another chance to shoot.
